archimate:Node.name: Solaris VMware Platform for ISIS
archimate:Node.documentation:
Manifests a set of Solaris Zones
Automatic failover RSF-1 e.g. Milne to Nesbitt. Using a VIP - Virtual IP - so ISIS Live can be run on Milne or Nesbitt
Zones on each of Milne and Nesbitt: live, dev, beta, qa, test qa, train (they try to run services dev etc. on the other server than live)
Server patching: they failover to the alternative host, then dev moves to the patched server for testing etc
